sentences.sContent: I’m sorry, I’ve forgotten your name.
sentences.sCn: 对不起，我忘记你的名字了。

sentences.sContent: I know you told me, but I forgot.
sentences.sCn: 我知道你告诉过我，但是我忘了。

sentences.sContent: What happened that day will never be forgotten.
He’s someone who never forgets a face (= forgets who someone is ) .
sentences.sCn: 他是那种见人一面就不会忘记的人。

sentences.sContent: ...It can be very hard to forget embarrassing moments...
...and then you get to forget it all...
...Let's not forget that electric vehicles are cleaner...
...The point is not to excuse or forget the crime...
...so that she won’t forget how to speak French...
...I’ll never forget that when I failed in my English examination and I felt overwhelmed...
...Why not have another Jammie Dodger biscuit and forget about it...
...Let’s not forget that electric vehicles are cleaner...
...There are many examples of the vast harm that is caused when individuals forget or ignore the effect their dishonesty can have...

phrases.pCn: 忘我，忘乎所以；失去知觉

words.tran: 健忘的；不注意的；疏忽的；使遗忘的

trans.tranOther: to not remember facts, information, or people or things from the past
